name: Counter
desc: You lean into an incoming attack, affording you the chance to strike.
cost: 1 _Momentum_, +1 _Momentum_ if the Attack is Speed 4 or slower.
trigger: You are Attacked by an adjacent enemy.
effect: Increase the Attack Roll by 1. You may immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a _Maneuver_/_Weapon Strike_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. You may instead Attack with any _Strike_.

name: Deflect
desc: You deflect a strike with arms or armor, lessening the blow.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Increase your _Guard_ by 1 against the Attack and reduce the _Grit_ cost to _Negate_ by 1.
boost: 2 _Grit_: Repeat the Effect. You may repeat this Boost, paying the cost each time.

name: Dodge
desc: You roll away, attempting to dodge an opponents strike.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Reduce the Attack Roll and _Reflex_ cost to _Negate_ by 1.
boost: 2 _Reflex_: Repeat the Effect. You may repeat this Boost, paying the cost each time.

name: Draw
desc: Switching weapons allows one to be prepared for any combat situation.
effect: Replace one or both of your Wielded equipment with a different piece of available equipment.
special: The Speed of Draw is equal to 1 + the total number of Hands of Equipment drawn or stowed. This becomes _Fluid_ 2 if you are drawing into an Open Hand.

name: Form Change
desc: By adopting a different fighting style or spirit stance, one can keep up with an ever-changing battlefield.
effect: Change your current Stance or Style.
imbue: Any 2 of _Momentum_/_Focus_. Form Change is instead a Reaction with the Trigger 'A Turn begins', so long as you currently have a Stance if you're changing Stances or a Style if you're changing Styles.

name: Grab
desc: A quick grab, to either reposition or grapple a foe.
effect: Attack using the below Profile.

name: Interact
desc: Sometimes.
effect: Interact is an Action that isn't covered by the other Actions in the game. Generally it involves interacting with the terrain in a distinct way, dealing with persistent combat effects, or fulfilling objectives on the battlefield. The Speed, Range, and Movement of this Action can vary depending on what is being undertaken. Your GM will determine the effects of Interact, with common examples listed in [MAKE EXAMPLES OF INTERACTS] here.
imbue: 2 _Momentum_. This is 0 AP and its Speed may become Set-Up or Follow-Up.

name: Opportunity Attack
desc: You capitalize on an opening, taking the chance to assault a foe.
cost: 1 _Momentum_, +1 _Momentum_ if the Attack is Speed 3 or slower.
trigger: An enemy within your Reach makes Movement that would take them out of your Reach.
effect: Immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a _Maneuver_/_Weapon Strike_.
special: The Movement of the _Maneuver_/_Strike_ you choose becomes None.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. You may instead Attack with any _Strike_.

name: Prepare
desc: You take evasive maneuvers, raise your guard, ready your mind, or look for an opening to help you win this battle.
effect: Gain any 2 of _Grit_, _Focus_, _Reflex_, or _Momentum_, in any combination.

name: Quick Strike
desc: A quick blow, sacrificing striking strength for speed.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. _Versatile_ Weapons deal -2 Damage.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add _Sure Hit_ 1.

name: Reorient
desc: You shift slightly, moving to a new position on the battlefield.
trigger: A Phase begins.
effect: None.
boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Add _Safe_.

name: Run
desc: A simple dash, covering ground as quickly as possible.
move:
The movement granted by Run determines its Speed, as follows: 
* <ins>Reposition:</ins> Speed 1 
*  <ins>Shift:</ins> Speed 2 
* <ins>Sprint:</ins> Speed 4
boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Decrease the Movement granted by this Action by one step but add the _Safe_ Keyword.

name: Shove
desc: A push, either to the ground or away.
effect: Attack using the below Profile.

name: Strong Strike
desc: A mighty blow, sacrificing power for speed.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile, dealing +1 Damage with a _Versatile_ weapon or +2 with a _Heavy_ weapon.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add _Unblockable_ 1.

name: Weapon Strike
desc: A standard strike, balancing damage and speed.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile.
imbue:
0 _Momentum_: Choose one:
* Add _Quick_. Speed is instead Weapon-1. _Versatile_ Weapons take a -2 damage penalty. 
* Add _Strong_. Speed is instead Weapon+1. Deal +1 Damage with a Versatile weapon or +2 with a Heavy weapon.

name: Pursuit
desc: You chase a foe as they attempt to flee, dedicated to keeping them within your reach.
cost: 1 _Reflex_, 1 _Momentum_, +1 _Momentum_ if the Attack is Speed 3 or slower.
trigger: An enemy within your Reach moves outside your Reach.
effect: At the end of that creature's turn, immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a _Maneuver_/_Weapon Strike_. You must use any _Movement_ granted by the chosen _Technique_ to move towards the enemy, ending this Reaction as close to them as possible. If you are adjacent to the target, make the Attack with _Advantage_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. You may instead Attack with any _Strike_.

name: Sudden Charge
desc: A reckless charge that always brings you closer to a nearby foe.
move:
The movement granted by Charge determines its Speed, as follows: 
* <ins>Step:</ins> Speed 1 
*  <ins>Reposition:</ins> Speed 2 
* <ins>Shift:</ins> Speed 4
effect: If you end your Movement next to a creature you may inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 (1 _Focus_) on them.
special: All Movement granted by this Technique must be used to move directly towards an enemy by the shortest possible route.
boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Increase the Movement by one tier, but all _Punish_ Attacks against you this _Turn_ have _Advantage_.

name: Blade Lock
desc: You lock your blade with an enemy, forcing them to give you their full attention.
effect: Unless the Target pays any 2 of _Reflex_/_Focus_ you enter a Blade Lock with them. Choose one of the creature's Wielded Weapons to enter a Blade Lock with, as well as a Blade Weapon you have Wielded. The first creature to either use the Weapon involved in the Blade Lock or willingly Move out of Melee Range loses the Blade Lock. The victor may immediately make a Weapon Strike against them at Advantage as a Reaction. On a _Hit_+,  inflict _Impaired_ 2 (2 _Grit_).
special: If the creature is unwillingly moved, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to make a Weapon Strike as a Reaction, although you do not have Advantage and do not inflict _Impaired_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: If you are using a Two-Handed Blade, increase the initial cost to Negate by 1.

name: Blade Parry
desc: You expertly defend and ready a counterattack in a fluid motion, putting every aspect of your blade to use.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Reduce the Attack Roll by 2 and increase your _Guard_ by 1 against the triggering _Attack_. If this makes the Attack a _Graze_-, you have _Advantage_ on your next Attack with a Blade Weapon against the creature (2 _Focus_ Negates).

name: Blinding Flourish
desc: You draw blood and, with an elegant flourish, use it to blind a foe.
reqs: Must be attached to a Weapon Strike made while Wielding a Blade Weapon.
effect: If you inflict _Bleed_ with the Attached Strike you may also inflict _Blind_ on a creature within Range until the end of their next turn. The Cost to Negate is (X _Reflex_), where X is equal to the total value of _Bleed_ inflicted.
imbue: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, this is 0 AP.

name: Flurry of Steel
desc: You unleash a rapid series of sword attacks in the blink of an eye.
trigger: You would make an Attack with a Blade at _Advantage_.
effect: Make the Attack twice against the same Target. Neither Attack has _Advantage_.

name: Lacerating Strike
desc: You go for a strike that leaves a vicious wound that, while not immediately lethal, will bleed heavily.
reqs: Light or Versatile Blade Weapon Wielded.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile and reduce the Damage by X, with a max of 3. Inflict _Bleed_ 2xX (X _Grit_ negates) on a _Hit_+.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Increase the Cost to Negate by 1, and inflict _Wounded_ 1 as well.

name: Nimble Blade
desc: You quickly strike with your blade while passing by a foe, potentially setting yourself up for a secondary strike.
effect: Use your Reposition Move. Attack using your Weapon's Profile. Use Step Move.
special: On a _Hit_+, you may choose to not inflict any Status with this Attack and add _Safe_ to the second Move.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Make an Attack after you use your Step Move.
imbue: 1 _Momentum_/_Grit_: Remove _Light_.

name: Swords Dance
desc: You weave your blades to an fro, creating a deadly web of steel to distract a foe as you prepare to strike.
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_. The Target gains _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Focus_) and takes Damage as if you rolled a 5 (1 _Reflex_ negates).
boost: 1 _Reflex_: Instead, inflict _Exposed_ 2 (2 _Focus_).

name: Vorpal Strike
desc: You go for a vicious strike that is almost certainly lethal for unarmored foes.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Treat the Target's _Guard_ as twice its current value for this attack. If the Target has no _Guard_ or you target a Creature Part, deal 3 additional Damage.

name: Warding Strike
desc: A strike that deals less damage, but easily allows you to slip into a defensive stance.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Reduce the Damage by 2. Gain 1 _Grit_/_Reflex_, or 2 _Grit_/_Reflex_ on a _Hit_+.
imbue:
1 _Momentum_: Choose one:
* Add _Quick_. Speed is Weapon-1 and Move is Step. _Versatile_ Weapons take a -2 Damage penalty. Gain 1 _Reflex_.
* Add _Strong_. Speed is instead Weapon+1 and Move is Step. _Versatile_ Weapons deal +1 Damage, _Heavy_ deal +2. Gain 1 _Grit_.

name: Blasting Strike
desc: You explosively charge your weapon, letting out a mighty blast as you make contact.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. After resolving that, immediately attack in the Area, treating your initial Target as the origin and attacking directly away from yourself.

name: Counterthrust
desc: A quick blast of flames allows a sudden, unpredictable change in momentum.
trigger: A Phase begins or you are Pushed.
effect: Deal 2 Fire Damage and inflict _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) to a creature you move past with this Reaction.

name: Detonation
desc: A focused explosion of flame and force, becoming near-impossible to evade.
effect: Attack with the below Profile.
special: If there are no other creatures or Obstacles within Range 2 of the Target, add the _Sure Hit_ 2 or _Unblockable_ 2 Keyword.

name: Explosive Blast
desc: You fire a close-ranged explosion, buffeting nearby enemies.
effect: Attack with the below Profile.
special: You may _Flying_ Move 1 directly away from the Area, or 3 if you Boost.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Area is instead Side Blast 2. Increase the _Push_ and Cost to Negate by 1.

name: Explosive Leap
desc: A quick detonation launches you into the air, providing enough propulsion for a sudden move.
effect: Deal 2 Damage and _Push_ 1 (1 _Reflex_ negates both) within the area either at the start or end of your Movement.
imbue: 1 _Momentum_. Instead, Movement is Shift, Speed is 3, and Area is Burst 2.

name: Explosive Touch
desc: You reach  out an simply touch a target, letting loose a powerful, close-range explosion.
effect: Attack with the below Profile. If the Target is an Obstacle, you may forgo an Attack Roll and treat your attack as if you rolled a 7. Gain 1 _Momentum_ if you Destroy an Obstacle with this.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Instead, Target is a creature.

name: Fireball
desc: A solitary mote of flame flies forth, before erupting into a truly horrific blast of flames.
effect: Attack with the below Profile.
special: You may choose to delay this Attack. Take the Action at the original Speed, and mark the Area as a _Hazard_. At any point this Round, you may pay 2 _Momentum_ as a Reaction to Attack, gaining a +1 bonus to Damage on a _Graze_,  _Hit_,  or Crit. You automatically Attack at the end of the round if you do not use this Reaction.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Create 3 _Blazing_ spaces within the area.

name: Flashbang
desc: An extremely focused, extremely bright detonation temporarily blinds a foe.
effect: Attack with the below Profile.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Instead target a _Blazing_ space within Range 8. Attack in a Burst 1 around the Target, then Destroy it.

name: Short Fuse
desc: You respond to an enemies' strike with an indiscriminate explosion, hopefully creating enough space for a opening.
trigger: You are hit by an Attack
effect: Attack with the below Profile.

name: Smoke Bomb
desc: An explosion choked with ash and smoke detonates, leaving an area on the battlefield choked with smoke.
effect: Gain 1 _Reflex_. The Area becomes Veiled until the end of the Round.
special: You may target a _Blazing_ space within Range. The Area becomes Blast 1, centered on the Target. Destroy the _Blazing_ space.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Instead, the Area becomes Veiled until the end of the next Round.

name: Volatile Mote
desc: You focus your energy, creating an explosion on the brink of detonation as an impromptu trap.
effect: Create a Blast 1 Hazard within Range. When a creature moves into this Hazard you must use a Reaction to Attack in all Hazard spaces.
special: You may pay 1 _Momentum_ to not trigger the Hazard when a creature moves into it.
boost: 3 _Momentum_. Reduce the Range to 6, but create two additional Blast 1 Hazards.

name: Volume of Fire
desc: A rapid-fire burst of explosions that can punish those without defenses.
effect: Attack with the below Profile.
special: On a _Crit_,  Boosting instead costs 0 _Momentum_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. If the Target does not take an Evade or Block Reaction you may immediately repeat this Action against the same Target.

name: Fan Flames
desc: A small fire flares to life, buffeting those nearby with intense heat.
effect: Immediately make two spaces adjacent to the Target _Blazing_. If there is a creature in one of these spaces, they must immediately spend 2 _Reflex_ to Move into a space without _Blazing_ or gain _Burn_ 2.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Inflit _Impair_ 1 (1 _Grit_) on all creatures adjacent to the Target.

name: Fire Shield
desc: You cloak yourself in flames, violently rebuking all melee attacks.
effect: While this Enchant is active you cannot gain _Burn_/_Frost_. Whenever a Melee Attack Grazes, Hits, or Crits you the attacker gains 1 _Burn_ (1 _Reflex_).
special: If you are hit with an Attack with the Water keyword, you must pay 1 _Momentum_ or lose this Enchant.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Inflict an additional _Burn_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) when you are Grazed, _Hit_,  or _Crit_ for the duration of this Enchant.

name: Fire Stepping
desc: You wreathe your feet in flames, leaving a wake of wild flames.
effect: Make up to three spaces you move through _Blazing_. Inflict _Burn_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) on any creature you move past or through. While using this Movement, you are Immune to the effects of _Blazing_ spaces.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Instead, make every space you move through _Blazing_.

name: Fire Wall
desc: Small flames grow in intensity, becoming mighty infernos across the field.
effect: These _Blazing_ spaces may be used as Cover until the end of the Round. In addition, the effects of _Blazing_ are doubled for the target until the end of the Round.
special: Until the end of the round, any time an ally would move into a targeted _Blazing_ space you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to allow them to ignore all Damage and Burn caused by the space.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Change the Target to 'Any number of contiguous _Blazing_ spaces, at least one of which is within range.'

name: Flame Blade
desc: A blade of flame ignites in your hand, burning away all in your path.
effect: Equip the Flame Blade Spirit Weapon in your Open Hand. This Enchant ends if you have no Flame Blades Equipped.
boost: 0 _Momentum_. If you have two Open Hands, you may equip a Flame Blade in each.

name: Flame Jet
desc: You let loose a mighty stream of fire, drawing upon nearby flames for additional power.
effect: Attack with the below Profile.
special: When you make this Strike, you may _Destroy_ any number of adjacent _Blazing_ spaces. If you _Destroy_ at least 2, the area becomes Cone 3. For each additional 2 spaces Destroyed, increase the Cone by 1.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Create a number of _Blazing_ spaces within the area equal to the size of the Cone.

name: Flame Wave
desc: A wide wave of fire shoots forth, scorching those in its path.
effect: Attack with the below Profile. You may repeat this Attack against a single creature adjacent to the original Target.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. If this attack Crits, inflict _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Reflex_).

name: Flamethrower
desc: You create a steady stream of flames from hands or mouth, blanketing the field in flames.
effect: Create a special zone of _Blazing_ spaces within the area. This zone moves with you and, at the beginning of a Phase, you may pay 1 _Momementum_ to change the direction of the zone. If a creature enters this zone or starts a Turn in it they gain _Burn_ 2, _Burn_ 1 (2 _Reflex_). This special zone goes away at the end of the Round.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Area is instead Cone 3.

name: Ignite
desc: A sudden strike of flames, often leaving a foe wreathed in flames.
effect: Attack with the below Profile.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Destroy a _Blazing_ space within Range 3 of the Target. If you do, on a _Graze_,  _Hit_,  or _Crit_ inflict an additional _Burn_ 2 and increase the Cost to Negate by 1.

name: Searing Strike
desc: A weapon is set ablaze or superheated, leaving a painful wound on a foe.
effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile. On a _Hit_/_Crit_,  inflict _Burn_ 1 and _Wounded_ 1 (2 _Reflex_).
boost: 1 _Momentum_. If the Target has any _Burn_ Tokens prior to this Attack, increase the Damage by 2 on a _Graze_,  _Hit_,  or Crit.

name: Set Blaze
desc: A blaze is set, starting what can grow into a deadly inferno.
effect: The area immediately becomes _Blazing_. Any creature in the area gains _Burn_ 1x2 (2 _Reflex_).
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Area becomes a Blast 1.

name: Torch
desc: Overwhelming waves of fire strike a foe, burning through any defenses.
effect: Attack with the below Profile.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Add _Pierce_ 3.

name: Avalanche
desc: The Earthbound seizes control of all nearby boulders, flinging them in a great wave.
target: Up to three Boulders within Range.
effect: Move all Targets 1 space in the same direction. If this would move the Target into an occupied space, Attack with the below profile. If this attack Pushes and the Target has remaining spaces to move, continue moving the Target.
boost: X _Momentum_. For every Momentum spent, move all Targets 1 additional space, deal 1 additional damage, and increase this Attack's Push by 1.

name: Avalanche Charge
desc: You charge forward, amplifying your speed by smashing through stones.
effect: During the Movement granted by this effect you can Move through Boulders, destroying them in the process. Gain 1 _Stone Armor_ for every Boulder destroyed in this way. If you Attach this to an Attack, deal +1 damage on a _Hit_/_Crit_ for each Boulder destroyed in this way.
special: All Movement granted by this Technique must be in a straight line, and must pass through at least one Boulder.

name: Boulder Throw
desc: A boulder is launched in a straight line, bludgeoning all in its path.
effect: Draw a Line 6 from the Target, Attacking with the below Profile against all targets in the area. Move the Boulder to the end of this Line after attacking. If the final space is occupied, move it to the last free space in the Area.
special: For each Size above 1 the target Boulder is, this Attack deals +1 damage on a _Graze_,  _Hit_,  or Crit.
boost:
1 _Momentum_ for each Size about 1 the Target is.
1 _Momentum_, 1 _Grit_: You may create a _Boulder_ within Range 3 before using this Technique.

name: Chip Damage
desc: You manipulate the shards of your shattered armor, striking back against your enemies.
trigger: You take Damage while having any _Stone Armor_ created by an Earth Technique or Stance.
effect: Attack all targets in the area with the below Profile.
boost: X _Stone Armor_. For each _Stone Armor_ spent, deal 2 additional damage on a _Hit_ or Crit.

name: Create Boulder
desc: Dirt and stone are formed into a mighty boulder, ready to be fired.
target: An unoccupied space made of earth or stone within range, or a Size 1 _Earthen Feature_.
effect: Create a Boulder in the target space, or replace the _Earthen Feature_ with a _Boulder_. Gain 1 _Grit_.
boost: 2 _Grit_: Instead create a Large Boulder, or create two additional Boulders. This only costs 1 _Grit_ if all Boulders created are replacing _Earthen_ Obstacles.
imbue: 2 _Momentum_: This is 0 AP.

name: Earthfall
desc: A quick coat of stone covers the weapon, amplifying the weight of the strike and leaving rubble near the target.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Regardless of the initial Damage Type, it now deals Crush Damage. If you _Hit_/_Crit_,  you may add _Push_ 1 (1 _Grit_) to the attack. Regardless, create a Boulder in a space Adjacent to the Target.

name: Fortifying Stone
desc: You pull stone around yourself or an ally, providing a powerful barrier against harm.
effect: Grant  1 _Grit_ and 1 _Stone Armor_. You may remove _Burn_, _Frost_ or _Shock_ 1 from the Target.
boost:
Choose any number:
* 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Range is instead 4.
* 2 _Grit_: If there is an _Earthen_ Obstacle adjacent to the Target, _Destroy_ it. Instead, grant 2 _Stone Armor_.

name: Fracture
desc: An obstacle within range detonates, sending a blast of stone shrapnel shredding through nearby enemies.
effect: Attack with the below Profile in a Burst 1 around the Target, then Destroy the Target.
special: Deal an additional 2 Damage if this Technique is used with a Boulder or Large Boulder.
boost: 2 _Momentum_/_Grit_: You may choose a Size 2 _Earthen_ Obstacle. Destroying the Obstacle, replace it with 3 Boulders, then move each Boulder one space diagonally away from the previous Obstacles's center. Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Rockslide
desc: A sudden shift of a boulder, throwing an enemy off-course.
trigger: A creature enters a space adjacent to a Boulder within Range.
effect: Attack the triggering target with the below Profile. If you _Push_ the target, move the Boulder so it is still adjacent to the target.
special: If this _Push_ moves the target adjacent to a new Boulder, you may pay the Cost again to repeat the Attack. A Boulder may only be used to attack once per Turn.

name: Stone Shield
desc: A slab of stone becomes a barrier, defending against ranged attacks.
target: Unoccupied adjacent spaces made of earth or stone within Range, or two adjacent Size 1 _Earthen_ Obstacles.
effect: Create an Earth Slab in unoccupied spaces within Range. At the start of each of your Turns, you may Move this Earth Slab up to 3 spaces, and turn it up to one space. The Earth Slab can move through occupied spaces, but may not end its movement there.
special: You may end this Enchant at the end of your Turn to immediately fire the Earth Slab forward. Make an Attack with an Improvised Heavy Weapon against all creates in a Line 6 originating from the Earth Slab, then place it at the end of this Area.

name: Stone Strike
desc: You fling a fist-sized stone at great speed, knocking enemies off-balance.
effect: Attack with the below Profile.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Halve the Damage, but you may repeat this Strike immediately after using it.

name: Stonescreen
desc: With a powerful strike an earthen obstacle is shattered, staggering and pushing all nearby.
effect: Destroy the Target. Attack in a Burst 1 around the Target using the below Profile. The area is _Veiled_ for two _Phases_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. The Range is instead 5.

name: Improvised Strike
desc: Any item can be a weapon, a simple fact you make use of for this strike.
effect: Immediately make an Attack using the Profile of an adjacent or Equipped Improvised Weapon. You may always make this attack using a Small Improvised Weapon by making use of rocks, sticks, and other small items that aren't shown on the map. Gain 1 _Momentum_ on a _Hit_ or Crit.
special: You do not have _Disadvantage_ when making _Thrown_ attacks with Improvised Weapons.

name: Crossing Field
desc: You sense a creature entering your field and rapidly close the distance, lashing out with a vicious attack.
cost: 1 _Reflex_, 1 _Momentum_, +1 _Momentum_ if the Attack is Speed 2 or slower.
trigger: An enemy enters your Air Field.
effect: Immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a _Maneuver_/_Weapon Strike_.
special: The Movement of the _Maneuver_/_Strike_ you choose becomes None, but you may use the Movement of this Technique. Any Movement taken must be towards the enemy.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. You may instead Attack with any _Strike_.

name: Curving Shot
desc: You guide your shot into a good wind, redirecting it into another foe.
trigger: You _Miss_ with a Ranged Attack using a Weapon.
effect: Immediately repeat the Attack against a different Target within Range 4 of the original Target.
boost:
1 _Momentum_. The Attack has Advantage. This Boost has no _Cost_ if the secondary Target is within your Air Field.
1 _Momentum_: Instead, the Trigger is 'An ally misses a Ranged Attack against a creature within your Air Field.'

name: Fieldsight
desc: You focus all your senses on your air field, expanding it but dulling your senses outside the field considerably.
effect: While this _Enchant_ persists, increase the size of your Air Field by 2. No Attacks that pass through your Air Field may have Advantage against you. However, you treat all spaces not within your Air Field as _Veiled_.

name: Flowing Dance
desc: You effortlessly move as soon as you sense an attack, spinning away flawlessly.
trigger: You are Attacked by a non-adjacent creature in your Air Field.
effect: Force the attacker to reroll the attack. They must use the new result. Inflict _Reveal_ (1 _Focus_) on the attacker, then _Safe_ Step.

name: Fluid Dodge
desc: You follow the path of least resistance, slipping away from a strike you sense coming far before it lands.
trigger: You are Attacked by a non-adjacent creature.
effect: Force the attacker to reroll the attack at _Disadvantage_. They must use the lower of the two results. You may _Safe_ _Step_ Move after this Reaction.
special: If the Attacker is in your Air Field, inflict _Knowledge_ 1 (1 _Focus_).

name: Gathering Dance
desc: You skirt past foes without a care in the world, sensing their air as you glide past.
effect: You may use as many _Evade_ Reactions as you wish this _Turn_ and reduce the _Cost_ of all of them by 1. Anytime you Move past a foe, inflict _Reveal_ (1 _Focus_). If anybody attacks you and _Misses_, inflict _Impaired_ 1 as well and increase the _Cost_ to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Guiding Thread
desc: As an ally is moved you feel the movement of the air and guide them into a more fortuitous path.
trigger: You or an ally within Range is _Pushed_/_Pulled_.
effect: The Target may resolve the _Push_/_Pull_ as if it originated from a space adjacent to the source of the effect.
boost:
1 _Focus_: They may instead resolve it as if it originated from a space within Range 2 of the source of the effect.
X _Focus_: Instead, reduce the cost to _Negate_ the triggering Effect by the amount paid in this Boost. You may also trigger this against a _Slide_.

name: Hone Senses
desc: You focus all your senses on your air field, expanding it but dulling your senses outside the field considerably.
effect: Increase the size of your Air Field by 1 until the end of the Round. Gain 1 _Reflex_ and 1 _Focus_.
imbue: 2 _Focus_: This is 0 AP.

name: Influence Flow
desc: You sense the air currents around you and subtly influence them.
effect: Inflict _Reveal_ (2 _Focus_) on a creature within Range. If they do not _Negate_ and after learning their next Technique, you may inflict either _Accelerate_/_Staggered_.
imbue: 2 _Focus_, 2 _Momentum_: Instead resolve this against all creatures of your choice within your Air Field.

name: Intercept
desc: You feel an attack incoming and, with perfect knowledge of its path, snatch it from the air.
trigger: A Ranged Attack is made against you.
effect: Make an Attack Roll. If it meets or exceeds the original Attack Roll, treat the original Attack Roll as a 5.
special: If the Attacker is in your Air Field, make the Attack Roll at _Advantage_.
boost:
1 _Reflex_: Instead, the Trigger is 'A Ranged Attack passes through an adjacent space.' Do not make the Attack Roll at _Advantage_.
2 _Reflex_: If you are wielding a Ranged or Thrown Weapon, the Trigger is instead 'A Ranged Attack passes through a space both within your Air Field and Weapon's Range.' Do not make the Attack Roll at _Advantage_.

name: Threading Strike
desc: Your strike follows the air currents, curving in unnatural ways to find its target.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. This Strike ignores _Cover_.
special: If the Target is in your Air Field, gain 1 _Momentum_ and this instead has _Sure Hit_ 2.

name: Wind Rider
desc: You move with a fluid grace, sensing the direction of the wind as you move through it.
effect: For the purposes of this Movement you may treat all _Windy_ spaces as whatever direction you wish.

name: Dual Strike
desc: A vicious attack, striking with two weapons in quick succession.
reqs: Separate Light or Versatile One-Handed Weapons Wielded in either hand.
effect: Immediately use the Quick Strike Action twice, using a different weapon for each Strike and declaring what weapon is being used before rolling the attack. The Damage from these Strikes is halved.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. After rolling your first Attack, you may change which weapon it is using, so long as the target is within Range of the new weapon.
imbue: 1 _Momentum_. You may use the faster of the two Wielded Weapons to determine Speed.

name: Second Blade
desc: No matter how a foe attempts to evade your strikes, you always have a second weapon to catch them.
reqs: Separate Light or Versatile One-Handed Weapons Wielded in either hand.
trigger: A creature uses an Evade Reaction against a Weapon Strike.
effect: Immediately use Quick Strike as a Reaction, using the Weapon not used for the triggering Strike.

name: Defensive Flourish
desc: You disengage your weapon with a defensive flourish, easily flowing back into a defensive stance.
reqs: Must be attached to a Weapon Strike made while only Wielding a One-Handed Weapon.
effect: If you _Graze_ with the Attached Strike, gain any two of _Grit_/_Reflex_. If you _Hit_,  instead any three. If you _Crit_,  instead any four.
imbue: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, this is 0 AP.

name: Mobile Flourish
desc: You disengage your weapon with a darting flourish, disengaging and slipping away from foes.
reqs: Must be attached to a Weapon Strike made while only Wielding a One-Handed Weapon.
effect: If you _Hit_/_Crit_ with the Attached Strike, gain 1 _Reflex_.
imbue: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, this is 0 AP.

name: Offensive Flourish
desc: You disengage your weapon with an offensive flourish, catching nearby foes off-guard.
reqs: Must be attached to a Weapon Strike made while only Wielding a One-Handed Weapon.
effect: Deal Damage to a creature within Range equal to half the damage you dealt with the Attached Strike. Gain 1 _Momentum_.
imbue: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, this is 0 AP.

name: Example Technique
desc: A sample Technique to outline the different potential parameters.
area: Area of Effect of the Technique
move: The distance you may Move with this Technique.
cost: An upfront cost typically for more powerful Techniques that must be paid when the Technique is used.
reqs: Requirements for using this Technique, typically the equipment you have Wielded.
trigger: A condition that must be fulfilled for this Action to be used, commonly for Reactions.
effect: The primary effect of the Technique.
special: The secondary effect of the Technique.
boost: An optional effect with an associated cost that can be paid when the Technique is used.
imbue: An upfront cost typically for more powerful Techniques that must be paid when the Technique is selected in the Plotting Phase.

name: Acrobatics
desc: You quickly get to your feet or adjust your position, leaving no openings for your foes to exploit.
trigger: Your _Turn_ begins.
effect: None.
boost: 1 _Reflex_: Trigger is instead 'A _Turn_ begins.'

name: Agile Counter
desc: As an attack narrowly misses you slip past a foe's guard to make a strike.
cost: 1 _Momentum_, 1 _Reflex_, +1 _Momentum_ if the Attack is Speed 3 or slower.
trigger: An adjacent enemy _Misses_/_Grazes_ with an Attack against you.
effect: You may immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a _Maneuver_/_Weapon Strike_.
special: The Movement of the _Maneuver_/_Strike_ you choose becomes None.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. You may instead Attack with any _Strike_.

name: Dodge Roll
desc: You roll away from an attacker, leaving them potentially striking nothing.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Resolve your Movement before the foe Attacks and inflict _Impaired_ 1 (1 _Focus_). If they cannot reach you with their remaining Movement the Attacker must either choose a new Target or lose the attack.

name: Evasion
desc: You dive out of the way of an incoming effect, mitigating its effects.
trigger: You are targeted by a damaging Area effect.
effect: If the Movement from this effect takes you out of the Area, reduce the _Cost_ to _Negate_ the triggering effect by 1 and halve the damage.
boost: 1 _Reflex_: Movement is instead Shift. You fall _Prone_ at the end of this Reaction.

name: Free Run
desc: You charge forward, using the terrain to accelerate yourself further.
move:
The movement granted by Free Run determines its Speed, as follows: 
* <ins>Step:</ins> Speed 1 
*  <ins>Reposition:</ins> Speed 2 
*  <ins>Shift:</ins> Speed 3
*  <ins>Sprint:</ins> Speed 5
effect: The first time you move adjacent to a Size 1 or larger _Obstacle_ or change _Elevation_, you may immediately take a _Safe_ _Step_ _Movement_. This _Movement_ must be in a straight line directly away from the _Obstacle_/_Elevation_ change.
special: When _Falling_, reduce the distance by 1 for this _Movement_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: You may trigger the Effect on another distinct _Obstacle_/_Elevation_ change. You may use this _Boost_ as many times as you can afford, but increase the _Cost_ by 1 each time.

name: Leaping Feint
desc: You leap over a foe, landing on the opposite side to deliver a might blow.
reqs: Must be Attached to a Single Target Strike and No Armor Worn.
effect: Gain 1 _Reflex_. After resolving this Technique's Movement, you may Step Move and _Jump_ for no Cost. If you _Move_ directly through a creature's space, land on the opposite side, and they do not _Hit_/_Crit_ you with a _Punish_ Attack, grant yourself _Advantage_ on the Attached Strike against that creature. You must use the Attached Strike's Movement after Attacking.

name: Lightning Reflexes
desc: You nimbly avoid an attack meant to exploit an opening.
trigger: A creature makes a _Punish_ Attack against you.
effect: Resolve the Attack as if it rolled a 5.
boost:
1 _Reflex_: Inflict _Exposed_ 1 (Any 2 _Focus_/_Reflex_).
1 _Reflex_: Instead, resolve the Attack as if it rolled a 2.

name: Quick Step
desc: Unhindered by armor you move quickly, repositioning at a rapid rate.
effect: Gain 2 _Reflex_.
imbue: 1 _Momentum_: This is instead 0 AP.

name: Tumble
desc: You roll away from an advancing foe, creating a slight opening.
trigger: A hostile creature ends their turn adjacent to you.
effect: Inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) on the triggering foe.

name: Butcher
desc: You defeat a foe in a brutal fashion, striking fear into the heart of your foes.
trigger: You defeat a creature.
effect: Choose a creature within Range. Inflict _Fear_ 2 (2 _Focus_) on them.

name: Stay Down!
desc: You lash out at foe, attempting to force them to stay on the ground where they belong.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. If the Target isn't Prone, this Attack has Disadvantage. Otherwise, deal an additional 2 Damage and inflict either _Grief_ 1 (1 _Focus_) or _Hobbled_ 1 (1 _Grit_).

name: Taunt
desc: You issue a challenge to a foe, forcing them to focus on you.
effect: Inflict _Rage_ 2 (2 _Focus_) on a creature within Range.
boost: 2 _Momentum: Instead, Range is Self and Area is Burst 2. Inflict the Effect on all creatures of your choice within Range.

name: Warcry
desc: You let out a triumphant shout as you defeat a foe, bolstering an ally's spirit.
trigger: You defeat a creature.
effect: Choose an ally within Range. They gain _Courage_ 2.

name: Ablative Antagonist
desc: You attempt to block an attack using a grappled creature, giving your foe a difficult choice.
trigger: You are Attacked with a Single-Target Attack while you are the _Top_ in a _Grapple_.
effect: The Attacker must choose: Either resolve the Attack against both you and the _Bottom_, dealing half Damage to both and reducing the cost to _Negate_ by 1 or reduce the Attack Roll by 3.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: You choose which Effect to use instead of the Attacker.

name: Grappling Strike
desc: You follow up an unarmed strike with an attempted grab to restrain a foe.
cost: 1 _Momentum_/_Grit_ if not using an Unarmed Weapon.
effect: Attack using your weapon's _Profile_. After resolving the Attack, use the Grab Maneuver. If you _Hit_ with the initial Attack, increase the cost to _Negate_ the Grab by 1. If you _Crit_,  instead increase it by 2.

name: Grappling Swing
desc: You slam a creature you have grappled into another, using them as a clumsy weapon.
reqs: Must be _Top_ in a _Grapple_ against a Size 1 or smaller creature.
effect: You may _Pull_ 3 (2 _Grit_) on the _Grappled_ creature. Attack using the Medium Improvised Weapon's _Profile_, resolving the Attack is if it originates from the _Grappled_ creature's space. Resolve the Attack against the _Grappled_ target as well.

name: Improved Grab
desc: A grab made with flawless technique to engage in a grapple.
effect: Attack using the below Profile.

name: Interposing Body
desc: You reposition a grappled target, forcing them between a foe and yourself.
trigger: You start a _Phase_ as the _Top_ in a _Grapple_.
effect: Create an Arc 3 adjacent to you, with a creature you have _Grappled_ and are the _Top_ in at the center. Any Attack that originates from or passes through these spaces takes a -1 penalty to the Attack Roll if Melee or treats you as if you have Cover if Ranged. On a _Miss_, the _Grappled_ creature takes 2 Damage. This effect persists until the end of the current _Phase_ or until you are no longer _Top_ in the _Grapple_.
boost: X _Grit_: You may _Pull_ the _Grappled_ creature X before resolving this effect. They may spend X+1 _Grit_ to _Negate_.

name: Lock
desc: You secure your grip on a grappled creature, limiting their ability to fight.
effect: Choose one of the _Bottoms_ Hands. Unless they spend 2 _Grit_ to _Negate_ this effect, they may not use that Hand for the remainder of the _Grapple_. Increase the _Cost_ of all _Reactions_ for that creature by 1 for the remainder of the _Grapple_.
special: After using this Action you must dedicate a Hand to maintaining the Lock. If you repeat the Action using a Hand already engaged in a Lock, Attack with the below profile.

name: Restraining Pin
desc: You take a grapple to the ground, harshly limiting a foe's mobility.
effect: For as long as the creature remains _Grappled_, they are _Restrained_, and your cost to _Negate_ the creature escaping the _Grapple_ is reduced by 1. The target creature may spend 2 _Grit_ to _Negate_ this effect, but they remain _Grappled_. While this effect persists you are _Stuck_. You may end this effect at the end of any of your _Turns_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: While the creature is under this effect, you may maintain the _Grapple_ without using any Hands.

name: Suplex
desc: You viciously flip a grappled creature for a devastating blow.
effect: Immediately _Move_ the _Bottom_ in the _Grapple_ to the opposite side of yourself and Attack them with the below _Profile_. The _Bottom_ may spend 2 _Grit_ before you make the attack to _Negate_; if they do, do not Move them and they take half Damage from the Attack.
special: You  may choose to end the _Grapple_ as a part of this Attack. If you do, increase the cost to _Negate_ the Attack by 1 and increase the Damage by 2.

name: Throw
desc: You attempt to fling a creature away, creating as much space as possible.
effect: Attack with the below Profile. Only deal Damage if you _Push_ the creature into an Obstacle or Creature. The Creature or Obstacle they collide with the same Damage and inflict _Dazed_ 1 (1 _Focus_).
special: If you are the _Top_ in a _Grapple_ and target the _Grappled_ creature you may instead instead end the _Grapple_. You automatically roll a 12.
boost: 1 _Focus_: If you Target an adjacent allied creature you may automatically roll an 8 and only inflict _Push_.

name: Bull Rush
desc: You charge forward with unstoppable force, crashing through all in your path.
effect: Any Creature you move through takes 3 Crush Damage is is knocked _Prone_ (2 _Grit_/_Reflex_). If they _Negate_ they take half Damage. You may attempt to crash through Obstacles with this Movement; make a Weapon Strike using a Body Weapon against any Obstacle in your path and add the _Siege_ Keyword. Whenever you make this Attack, you may spend 1 _Grit_ to increase the Damage by 4 if you fail to destroy the Obstacle.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Immediately repeat this Technique.

name: Concussive Slam
desc: A mighty blow that crashes into the ground, creating a shockwave around the initial attack.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Immediately after the Attack, repeat it in a Burst 1 around the original Target. You may exempt yourself from this attack. Create _Rough Terrain_ in the area around the attack.

name: Gaia Strike
desc: A blow using every ounce of strength within the earth itself.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile, dealing +3 damage bonus with a _Versatile_ Weapon or +5 with a _Heavy_ Weapon. After determining the total Damage, double it. Add _Push_ 8, _Prone_ (3 _Grit_) to the Attack.
boost: 4 _Momentum_: Instead, triple the total Damage.

name: Gather Strength
desc: The ground around you cracks as you pull the strength of the earth inward.
effect: Gain 2 _Grit_ and 1 _Momentum_.
special: If you are in a Grounding Stance gain 1 additional _Grit_.
boost: 1 _Focus_, 1 _Grit_: Make all adjacent spaces _Rough_.

name: Mighty Fling
desc: Using their monstrous strength, the earthbound flings an object with horrific force.
reqs: Weapon Equipped or adjacent Improvised Weapon.
effect:
Make an Attack with the appropriate _Profile_ as follows:
 * If using an Improvised Weapon, resolve it with the appropriate Profile.
 * If using a Weapon with the _Thrown_ property, use its Profile.
 * If using a _Light_ Weapon, resolve it with the Small Improvised Weapon _Profile_.
 * If using a _Versatile_ Weapon, resolve it with the Medium Improvised Weapon _Profile_.
 * If using a _Heavy_ Weapon, resolve it with the Large Improvised Weapon _Profile_.

If the Weapon already has the _Thrown_ tag, increase it's value by 2. Otherwise, add _Thrown_ 3.
boost: 2 _Grit_: You may treat any adjacent Size 1 _Obstacle_ as a Large Improvised Weapon. Place it adjacent to the _Target_ after attacking. This only costs 1 _Grit_ if you are in a _Grounding_ Stance.

name: Mighty Leap
desc: You gather the earth's strength in your legs before launching yourself through the air.
effect: Increase your _Jump_ value by 3 or double it for the _Turn_, whichever is higher. Separate from your _Move_ this _Turn_ you may make a single _Jump_. At the end of this _Jump_, make the Area _Veiled_ and _Push_ 1 (1 _Grit_) all creatures in it.
imbue: 2 _Momentum_: This is 0 AP. _Attach_ this to an Technique. Resolve this Technique Effect simultaneously with the _Attached_ Action, but the _Move_ from this Technique becomes _None_.

name: Mighty Throw
desc: Drawing upon the earth, you fling a grappled creature a frightening distance.
effect: Attack with the below Profile. Only deal Damage if you _Push_ the creature into an Obstacle or Creature. The Creature or Obstacle they collide with the same Damage and inflict _Dazed_ 1 (2 _Focus_).
special: If you are the _Top_ in a _Grapple_ and target the _Grappled_ creature you may instead instead end the _Grapple_. You automatically roll a 12.
boost:
2 _Grit_: Increase the _Push_ by 2. This only costs 1 _Grit_ if you are in a _Grounding_ Stance.
1 _Focus_: If you Target an adjacent allied creature you may automatically roll an 8 and only inflict _Push_.

name: Mountain Crash
desc: You become as solid as a mountain against a foe's strike.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 2 and inflict _Impaired_ 1 (1 _Focus_). You may spend _Grit_ in place of _Reflex_ to _Negate_ this Attack. Gain _Hobbled_ 1.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: You may use the Weapon Strike Technique, treating its Move as none. You must use a _Body_ Weapon.

name: Titan's Grasp
desc: You grip is like inescapable iron, crushing all that you hold.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. On a _Hit_+ on a Creature, add _Grapple_ (2 _Grit_) or _Shred_ 1 (2 _Reflex_) to the Attack. If attacking an _Obstacle_ you have _Advantage_.
special: If the _Target_ is the _Bottom_ in a _Grapple_ that you are _Top_ in you have _Advantage_ on the Attack and deal an additional 2 Damage.

name: Unrelenting Strength
desc: You use your colossal strength to knock aside lesser concerns.
effect: You may treat yourself as Size 2 for the remainder of the _Round_ whenever you wish. Reduce the cost to _Negate_ _Grappled_, _Push_, _Pull_, or _Slid_ and the cost to remove _Grappled_, _Restrained_ and _Entombed_ by 1 for the same duration.
boost: 2 _Grit_: Instead, you may treat yourself as Size 3 and Reduce the cost to _Negate_ or remove by 2.

name: Animate Vine
desc: You amplify the growth of a nearby plant, creating an aggressive vine capable of grappling foes.
effect: Destroy the Target, then create an Animated Vine with 10 Health in the same space. As a Reaction when a creature moves within Range 3 of your Animated Vine, you may pay 1 _Momentum_/_Focus_ to have it use the Grab Action as if it had Reach 2, targeting the triggering creature.
boost:
2 _Momentum_: Remove the Enchant Keyword.
	2 _Momentum_: Your vine is covered in aggressive thorns or resembles a carnivorous plant. Increase the Cost of your Reaction by 1, but deal 3 Damage on a _Graze_,  4 Damage on a _Hit_,  and 5 Damage on a Crit.

name: Bramble Wall
desc: Dangerous vines covered in thick thorns shoot up, .
effect: All Target spaces become _Bramble Wall_s.
special: If a creature is in a Target space, they must pay 1 _Reflex_ and Move 1 or take 2 Stab Damage and gain _Bleed_ 1. If they cannot Move out of a Target space, they cannot pay this cost.

name: Ensnare
desc: Vines erupt around a target, limiting their mobility and restraining them.
effect: Attack with the below Profile. If _Stuck_, the creature is _Stuck_ until they spend Grit equal to the Negate cost at the end of their turn. If _Restrained_, a creature is _Restrained_ until they Sacrifice an Action and spend Grit equal to the Negate cost, or deal 6 Damage in a single attack, targeting the vines ensnaring them. If this Crits, they must instead deal 10 Damage.
special: If the Target is in an _Overgrown_ space, increase the Cost to Negate by 1. If the space is also an Ensnaring Vine, this Attack has Advantage.

name: Ensnaring Vines
desc: You amplify the growth of a nearby plant, creating an aggressive vine capable of grappling foes.
effect: All _Overgrown_ spaces become Ensnaring Vines while this Enchant persists. Treat these spaces as _Overgrown_, but also inflict _Hobbled_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) on any creature that starts or ends their Turn in an Ensnaring Vines space.
special: Whenever a creature enters an Ensnaring Vines space, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to inflict _Hobbled_ 1 and _Impaired_ 1 (2 _Reflex_).
boost:
X _Momentum_: For each Momentum spent, two Target spaces do not need to be _Overgrown_.
	2 _Momentum_: Remove the Enchant Keyword.

name: Flourishing Strike
desc: You lash out with your weapon, encouraging nearby plants to flourish and grow, granting you an edge.
effect:
Attack using your Weapon's Profile. Choose one of the following:
	• If there is an _Overgrown_ space adjacent to the Target, _Destroy_ it and gain a +1 bonus to your Attack Roll.
	• If there is a _Wood Source_ Embedded in the Target, _Destroy_ it to deal 2 _True Damage_ and inflict _Hobbled_ 1 and _Impair_ 1 (2 _Reflex_).
	• If there is an _Enchant_ with the _Wood_ Keyword within Range 5 of you, you may trigger its effect, reducing its Cost by 1.
	• Gain 1 _Focus_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_, 1 _Focus_: Choose two Effects.

name: Nature's Blessing
desc: You encourage growth in an area, creating fertile soil that plants readily grow in.
effect: Create a Nature's Blessing at the center of the Area with 10 Health and 1 _Guard_. If the Nature's Blessing is Destroyed, this _Enchant_ ends. While this Enchant Persists, Reduce the Cost of all _Wood_ Actions by 1 if they target something in this area. If the Nature's Blessing exists at the start of the Round, you may use the Overgrow, Bramble Wall, or Sprout Tree Action as a 0 AP, Speed 1 Action so long as it only targets spaces within the Area.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: If, at the end of the Round, at least half the spaces within the Area are _Overgrown_, Bramble Walls or _Tree_s you may Boost to increase the Area by 1 and increase the Nature's Blessing Health by 5 and _Guard_ by 1.

name: Nature's Veil
desc: Nature clings closely to you, obscuring your movements and providing an obscuring veil.
trigger: A Phase Begins.
effect: For the rest of the Phase you are considered _Veiled_ whenever you are on _Overgrown_ Terrain.
boost: 1 _Focus_: You may instead Target a creature within Range 4, granting them the Effect.

name: Overgrow
desc: Thick plants begin to grow, creating thick foliage that limits movement.
effect: The target Area becomes _Overgrown_. Gain 1 _Momentum_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Area is instead Blast 1.

name: Seeding Strike
desc: Your weapon flares to life, carrying the seeds for a host of plant life with it.
effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile. _Embed_ a _Wood Source_ on 8+. If you do not _Embed_, create an _Overgrown_ space adjacent to the Target.

name: Sprout Tree
desc: Plants grow taller and stronger, becoming small trees at a rapid rate.
effect: If you Target an _Overgrown_ space, turn it into a Size 1 _Tree_. If you target a _Tree_, you may increase its Source value by 1. Gain 1 _Grit_.
special: If you Target a Size 1 _Tree_ who's Source value is 3, you may instead make it Size 2. If you Target a Size 2 Tree who's Source Value is 7, you may instead make it Size 3.
boost: 1 _Focus_: Instead of choosing three independent targets, you may instead target the same space multiple times.

name: Thorn Strike
desc: You unleash a close-range hail of thorns on foe, leaving painful barbs throughout their hide.
effect: Attack with the below Profile.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Choose an _Overgrown_/_Wood Source_ space within Range 8. Originate the attack from there rather than yourself.

name: Vine Whip
desc: You suddenly sprout a vine, lashing it out towards a foe and pulling them closer.
effect: Attack with the below Profile.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Choose an _Overgrown_ space within Range. Originate the attack from the _Overgrown_ space rather than yourself.

name: Cleaving Strike
desc: You swing your weapon in a mighty arc, potentially striking through multiple foes.
reqs: _Heavy_ One or Two-Handed Melee Weapon Wielded
effect: Attack with your Weapon's Profile in the Area.

name: Pommel Strike
desc: You quickly attack with the base of your weapon, knocking a foe off-balance.
reqs: _Heavy_ One or Two-Handed Melee Weapon Wielded
effect: Attack with the below Profile.
imbue: 1 _Momentum_. Speed is instead Set-Up, and the Cost to Negate is increased by 1.

name: Power Through
desc: Attempting to block your weapon is one of the greatest acts of folly imaginable.
reqs: _Heavy_ One or Two-Handed Melee Weapon Wielded.
trigger: A Size 1 creature uses a _Block_ Reaction against a Weapon Strike.
effect: The triggering creature must immediately pay 1 _Grit_ or be _Push_ed 2 and knocked _Prone_. They may pay 1 _Grit_ to Negate this, but you may immediately repeat this Reaction against them as long as you can pay the Cost.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Change the Trigger to say 'A Size 2 creature'.

name: Shieldbreaker
desc: You bring your weapon down in a vicious blow, tearing a foe's defenses asunder.
reqs: _Heavy_ One or Two-Handed Melee Weapon Wielded
effect: Attack with your Weapon's Profile. Add _Pierce_ 2 to the Attack.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Also resolve this Attack against the Target's Armor or Shield using the original roll. This Boost has no Cost if the Target uses a Block Reaction.

name: Aspect of Terror
desc: You seize hold a target's fears, placing yourself as the chief among them.
effect: Choose a creature within range and inflict _Fear_ 1 (1 _Focus_). So long as this _Enchant_ persists any Movement towards you costs 1 _Focus_ per space for the Target. This _Enchant_ ends if the creature ends its turn with no _Fear_.

name: Avatar of Fear
desc: You imbue a creature with the embodiment of fear, giving foes pause against approaching them.
target: Self or an ally within Range.
effect: While this _Enchant_ persists the Target becomes the Avatar of Fear. Foes treat themselves as half as far from the Avatar for the purpose of triggering _Fear_. Foes with _Fear_ take a Penalty equal to half their topmost _Fear_ on all Attacks against the Avatar.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Whenever the Avatar Attacks, either you or the Avatar you may use this Boost. Gain a _Bonus_ to the _Attack_ equal to half the target's topmost _Fear_.

name: Coward's Aid
desc: You enhance an ally's sense of fear and self-preservation, allowing them to flee from approaching foes.
effect: Inflict _Fear_ 1 on the Target. They may pay 1 _Reflex_ to immediately _Safe_ _Reposition_. They must end this Movement at least X spaces from all foes, where X is twice their _Fear_ value.
boost: 1 _Focus_: Instead, inflict _Fear_ 2. Target may instead _Shift_.

name: Cower!
desc: You amplify a foe's sense of fear, causing them to break ranks and flee.
effect: The Target must immediately Move as far away as possible from a creature of your choice within Range. Their Movement depends on their topmost _Fear_ Token; _Step_ for _Fear_ 1, _Reposition_ for _Fear_ 2, or _Shift_ for _Fear_ 3.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Clear the creature's topmost _Fear_ Token. Inflict _Impaired_ with the same value. The creature then falls _Prone_.

name: Desperation!
desc: You reach out to an injured ally's heart, encouraging them to struggle for their life.
trigger: You or an ally makes an Attack.
effect: Inflict _Fear_ 2 on the Target. They may make the Attack at _Advantage_.
special: If the Triggering Target has less than a third of their Endurance reduce the Cost by 1.
boost: Any 2 _Focus_/_Momentum_: The Attack deals additional damage equal to the Triggering Target's topmost _Fear_ Token.

name: Frightening Howl
desc: You unleash a terrifying howl, sending all that can hear you scrambling.
effect: Inflict _Fear_ 1 (1 _Focus_) on all creatures in the Area. If creatures do not _Negate_, they  must immediately _Step_ Move directly away from you.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, inflict _Fear_ 2 (2 _Focus_).

name: Horror Strike
desc: A strike that draws upon primal fears, leaving foes cowering.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. On a _Hit_, inflict _Fear_ 1 (1 _Focus_). On a _Crit_, inflict _Fear_ 2 (2 _Focus_).

name: Incite Panic
desc: You channel the essence of fear into a foe, causing them to quake in their boots.
effect: Choose a creature within range. Inflict _Fear_ 2 or _Fear_ 1x2 (2 _Focus_).
boost: 1 _Momentum_: After inflicting _Fear_ you may redistribute the target's _Fear_ Tokens in whatever way you wish, so long as the total value remains the same. For example, three _Fear_ 1 Tokens may be made a single _Fear_ 3 Token.

name: Mind Killer
desc: Fear consumes a foe's mind, destroying their ego.
effect: Inflict _Staggered_ (3 _Focus_). If, on the creature's _Staggered_ Technique they do not clear a _Fear_ Token due to distance resolve that _Fear_ Token twice and inflict _True_ Damage equal to twice that Token's Value.

name: Scurry
desc: You heighten your sense of fear and flee from an approaching foe.
trigger: A foe ends their _Turn_ adjacent to you.
effect: Gain _Fear_ 1.
boost:
1 _Focus_/_Reflex_: Instead, Gain _Fear_ 2. Movement is Shift.
2 _Focus_: Trigger is instead 'A foe ends their _Turn_ adjacent to an ally.' The ally instead may Move and gains the _Fear_.

name: Striking Shadows
desc: You spark fear in a creature's heart, causing them to strike out at shadows.
effect: Inflict _Fear_ 1 (3 _Focus_). If the Target does not Negate, the creature immediately makes an Attack with a Weapon they have _Wielded_ of your choice against a creature of your choice within Weapon Range. If the Weapon Speed is slower than this Technique this Attack is made at _Disadvantage_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: The Target may _Step_ before making an attack.

name: Terrifying Butcher
desc: You make a spectacle of defeating a foe while exuding an aura of pure terror.
trigger: You defeat a creature.
effect: Choose a creature within Range. Inflict _Fear_ 3 (2 _Focus_) on them. If they do not _Negate_, they must immediately take a Step Movement directly away from you.
special: Gain the Butcher Technique.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: In addition, transfer all _Fear_ the defeated creature had to the Target. Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 2.

name: Attract
desc: You reach out with magnetic force, drawing metal closer to you.
effect: If you are targeting an inanimate _Metal Source_, _Pull_ 4. Otherwise, Attack with the below Profile. If this _Pull_ causes the Target to collide with an Obstacle they take 3 damage and are knocked _Prone_ (1 _Reflex_).
special: You may instead Target an Anchor of any Size. If you do, _Pull_ yourself 4 towards the Target.
boost: X _Momentum_. Increase all _Pull_ effects by 1 or increase the Size of the Target by 1 for each _Momentum_ spent. Reduce the cost to _Boost_ by 1 for each Anchor within Range 3 of you. In addition, you may _Pull_ X any unequipped _Metal Sources_ within Range.

name: Crush
desc: You compress metal around a creature, causing unavoidable damage.
target: A creature that is a _Metal Source_.
effect: Deal 3 damage to the Target. If the Target is a Metalbound, they may pay 2 _Grit_ or 2 _Focus_ to negate this attack.
special: For each _Metal Source_ on a Target beyond the first deal +1 damage.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Inflict _Hobbled_ 1x2 (2 _Grit_) on the Target.

name: Lay Anchor
desc: You plant metal firmly into the terrain, providing a useful anchor to push and pull from.
target: Size 1 or smaller _Metal Source_ within Range.
effect: Move the Metal Source to a free space or Obstacle within Range. You may treat this Metal Source as an _Anchor_. Gain 1 _Momentum_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Repeat the Effect with a new Metal Source or Target a Size 2 _Metal Source_.

name: Magnet Pull
desc: You bond yourself to a metal source, either tethering it close to you or keeping it forcefully away.
target: Creature with a _Metal Source_ or an _Anchor_.
effect: If the Target is a creature, choose one: Either all Movement towards you costs double and it costs 1 more to Negate all your _Push_ effects or all Movement away from you costs double and it costs 1 more to Negate all your _Pull_ effects. If the Target is an _Anchor_, you are instead Immune to all _Push_, _Pull_, and _Slide_ effects while within Range 3 of the _Anchor_. This _Enchant_ ends if the Target removes the _Metal Source_ or the _Anchor_ is destroyed.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. If there is an _Anchor_ within Range and you target a creature, instead create a bond between the _Anchor_ and the creature.

name: Magnetic Return
desc: A missed shot or throw is immediately pulled back for a surprise strike.
trigger: You _Miss_ with a Ranged Attack using metal.
effect: Immediately repeat the Attack against the Target. If the Attack still misses, the metal returns to you.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. The Attack has Advantage.

name: Magnetic Ward
desc: A metal weapon is pushed away at the last second, providing a remarkable defense.
trigger: You are Attacked with metal.
effect:
If you paid _Grit_ for the Cost: Add the _Block_ Keyword to this Reaction reduce the Attack Roll by 3.
If you paid _Reflex_ for the cost: Add the _Evade_ Keyword to this Action and reroll the Attack with Disadvantage, using the lower of the two Attack Rolls.
boost: 1 _Grit_ OR 1 _Reflex_ (whichever was not paid in the Cost): Use both Effects.

name: Repel
desc: You lash out with magnetic force, launching the _Metal Source_ backwards.
effect: If you are targeting an inanimate _Metal Source_, _Push_ 4. Otherwise, Attack with the below Profile. If this _Push_ causes the Target to collide with an Obstacle they take 3 damage and are knocked _Prone_ (1 _Reflex_).
special: You may instead Target an Anchor of any Size. If you do, _Push_ yourself 4 from the Target.
boost: X _Momentum_. Increase all _Push_ effects by 1 or increase the Size of the Target by 1. Reduce the cost to _Boost_ by 1 for each Anchor within Range 3 of you. In addition, you may _Push_ X any unequipped _Metal Sources_ within Range.

name: Seize
desc: You hold a creature aloft with magnetic force, leaving them defenseless.
target: A Size 1 creature with a _Metal Source_.
effect: Attack with the below Profile.
special: The duration of _Restrained_ depends on your Attack Roll. On a _Graze_,  the Target is _Restrained_ until the end of the current Phase. On a _Hit_ they are _Restrained_ until the end of the current Round. On a _Crit_,  they are _Restrained_ until the start of this Phase next Round.
boost: X _Momentum_. Increase The _Slide_ by 1 per _Momentum_ spent. Reduce the cost to _Boost_ by 1 for each Anchor within Range 3 of you.

name: Shackle
desc: You fire off metal towards a creature, seeking to restrain and wrap it around them.
effect: Attack with the below Profile. Place the _Metal Source_ adjacent to the Target unless you _Embed_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Choose a Metal Source within Range that is not Embedded. Originate the attack from the Metal Source rather than yourself.

name: Shardstrike
desc: Metal flies forth from you, striking with telekinetic precision.
effect: Attack with the below Profile. Place the _Metal Source_ adjacent to the Target, unless you _Embed_.
special: Increase the damage by 1 for each _Anchor_ within Range 3 of you.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Choose a Metal Source within Range that is not Embedded. Originate the attack from the Metal Source rather than yourself.

name: Storm of Steel
desc: You pull metal into a rapid orbit about yourself, creating a flurry of deadly metal.
target: Size 1 or smaller _Metal Source_ within Range.
effect: Destroy the Target. Create a Burst 1 around you that moves with you and persists until this Enchant ends. Any creature that enters this Area or starts a Turn there takes 3 damage. If they end their turn there they gain _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Grit_).
special: You may instead originate this Action from an _Anchor_ within Range 6, treating the _Anchor_ as the origin for the Storm of Steel. If you do, Boost costs 2 less and does not require any additional _Metal Source_. You are Immune to all effects of this Storm of Steel.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. If there is a second _Metal Source_ or a Size 2 _Metal Source_ within Range, Destroy it. Increase the Area to Burst 2.

name: Tear Away
desc: You tear away an enemy's defenses, either disarming them or removing a portion of their armor.
target: Metal weapon or armor on a creature.
effect: Attack with the below Profile. If you _Disarm_ you may place the weapon in an unoccupied square adjacent to yourself or immediately Equip it in an Open Hand. If you _Shred_, create a _Metal Source_ in an unoccupied adjacent square adjacent to you for each instance of _Shred_ inflicted.
special: The Status of this attack depends on if you target a weapon or armor. If you target a weapon, inflict _Impaired_ 1 on a _Graze_,  _Impair_ 2 on a _Hit_,  and _Disarm_ on a _Crit_. If you target armor, inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 on a _Graze_,  _Vulnerable_ 2 OR _Shred_ 1 on a _Hit_,  and _Vulnerable_ 3 AND _Shred_ 2 on a Crit.

name: Armored Blow
desc: A powerful attack that relies on your armor's protection.
reqs: Melee Weapon Wielded and Heavy Armor Worn.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Deal additional Damage equal to the _Guard_ provided by your Armor.
special: Increase your _Guard_ by 2 against any _Punish_ attacks triggered by this Attack.

name: Armored Charge
desc: You charge forward, using your armor as a weapon to smash forward.
move:
The movement granted by Free Run determines its Speed, as follows: 
* <ins>Step:</ins> Speed 1 
*  <ins>Reposition:</ins> Speed 2 
*  <ins>Shift:</ins> Speed 3
*  <ins>Sprint:</ins> Speed 5
effect: The Movement granted by this Technique must be taken in a straight line. You may make a Weapon Strike with a Body Weapon against all creatures you move through with this Movement.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Increase your _Guard_ by 2 for this Movement.

name: Armored Rebuke
desc: A foe's ineffectual attack causes them to stagger back off-balance.
trigger: An Attack _Misses_/_Grazes_ you.
effect: Inflict _Push_ 1, _Exposed_ 1 (Any 2 _Grit_/_Focus_) on the Attacker.
special: If your _Guard_ reduces the Damage of a Strike to 0, you may instead make a Weapon Strike against the creature using an Unarmed Weapon.

name: Armored Shell
desc: You let a blow land solidly on your armor, unconcerned about the damage.
reqs: Light or Heavy Armor Worn with _Guard_ remaining.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Resolve the attack against your Armor rather than yourself, dealing an additional 1 Damage.

name: Glancing Blow
desc: You use your armor to knock an attack away, relying on your impenetrable shell.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Reduce the Attack Roll by 2. If the Attack Grazes, reduce the cost to _Negate_ by 1 and increase your _Guard_ by 2 against this Attack.

name: Lean In
desc: You trust entirely in your armor against an attack.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Increase your _Guard_ against the Attack by 2 and reduce the _Grit_ cost to _Negate_ by 1. Resolve the Attack against your Armor as well, but do not take any additional Damage or Status from it.
boost: 1 _Grit_: This does not use your Reaction.

name: Shrug Off
desc: Your heavy armor allows you to deflect conditions far easier than most.
trigger: You would gain _Bleed_ or an _Elemental Condition_.
effect: You may pay the cost to _Negate_ the triggering Condition using _Grit_. If it already cost _Grit_, reduce the cost to _Negate_ by 2.

name: Steady
desc: You don't move quickly but the protection offered by your armor more than compensates.
effect: Gain _Staggered_ and _Grit_ 2.
boost: 2 _Grit_: Gain _Hobbled_ 1, but increase your _Guard_ by 1 until your next Turn.

name: Weighted Blow
desc: You follow up a melee strike by simply bringing your armored form to bear.
reqs: Heavy Armor Worn and must be Attached to a Melee Attack.
effect: Gain 1 _Grit_. If the Attack was _Hit_, add _Push_ 1, _Impair_ 2 (2 _Grit_) to the Attack. On a _Crit_, add _Prone_ and increase the Cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Driving Flourish
desc: You push a foe back at spearpoint, giving you space to make use of your exceptional reach.
reqs: Must be attached to a Weapon Strike made while Wielding a Lance Weapon.
effect: On a _Graze_ with the Attached Strike, add _Push_ 2 (1 _Grit_) to the Attack. On a _Hit_,  add _Push_ 3 (2 _Grit_). On a _Crit_,  add _Push_ 4 (3 _Grit_).
special: A foe may choose to instead take Damage equal to the _Push_ value to instead not be _Pushed_. If a creature cannot be _Push_ed, either due to an ability or an Obstacle, they must take this Damage. This Damage is added to the total damage done by the initial attack.
imbue: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, this is 0 AP.

name: Haft Strike
desc: You whip the butt of your spear around for a swift, if less damaging, attack.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Deal half Damage, and replace all _Hobbled_ with _Exposed_.

name: Harrying Thrust
desc: You quickly strike with your spear in an attempt to limit a foe's mobility, only catching them if they continue to advance.
trigger: A creature enters a space within your Lance Weapon's _Reach_.
effect: The target gains _Hobbled_ 1 (2 _Reflex_). Instead of applying this to the creature's next Movement it is instead applied to their current Movement, even if that Movement is already affected by _Hobbled_.
special: The target may _Negate_ the _Hobbled_ for no cost by allowing you to immediately make a Weapon Strike against them. If they do, the cost to _Negate_ any effects from the Attack are reduced by 1.

name: Lower Spear
desc: You ready your weapon for an incoming charge, preparing to punish a foe's momentum.
effect: Make all spaces in a Side Burst X a Hazard, where X is your Lance Weapon's Reach. If your Reach changes, adjust the size of this Side Burst. All Reactions using your Lance Weapon against a creature in these spaces cost 1 less and deal additional damage equal to the distance the creature is from you. All Reactions using your Lance Weapon cost 1 more against creatures not in these Hazard spaces. These Hazards are removed if you move or are no longer Wielding your Lance.

name: Lunging Strike
desc: You lunge with your weapon, extending your reach.
effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Increase the _Reach_ of the Weapon by 1 for this Turn.
special: You may _Improvise_ this Action as if it had _Fluid_ 2. Gain 1 _Exposed_ if you do so.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, increase your _Reach_ by 2.

name: Polearm Vault
desc: You use your polearm as a vaulting pole, launching yourself upwards
effect: Increase your _Jump_ value by an amount equal to 1 + your Weapon's _Reach_ for this Turn. Gain 1 _Momentum_.
imbue: 1 _Momentum_: This is 0 AP, but you may not take any Movement beyond the _Jump_.

name: Retreating Jab
desc: You quickly strike with your spear, sliding away as a part of the attack.
effect: You may not Move until after you Attack, and must end this Move further away from the Target than you started the Turn. Attack using your weapon's Profile. On a _Hit_+, add _Safe_ to this Movement.
special: When used as a part of a _Reaction_ that normally does not allow you to Move, you may pay 2 _Reflex_ to _Step_ Move.

name: Run Down
desc: You charge forward with your lance, targeting a single foe with extreme prejudice.
effect: You must complete your Movement before resolving the rest of this effect. Attack using your weapon's _Profile_. If you do not _Miss_, instead of resolving the Attack, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to deal Damage as if you rolled a 5 and inflict _Push_ 1 (1 _Grit_) and repeat the Attack against the same Target. If you _Push_, you may immediately Move forward the same amount. If you instead choose to keep the Attack, you may inflict _Push_ 2 (2 _Grit_).

name: Set Spear
desc: You prepare yourself for an attack, situating your lance in the ideal space for a strike.
effect: Gain 1 _Focus_. Until you make an Attack with your Lance Weapon this _Round_ or move increase your Lance Weapon's _Reach_ by 1 and gain _Advantage_ on your next Attack with it.

name: Burrow
desc: The Earthbonded moves through the earth like a mole, safely reaching their destination.
effect: This Movement ignores all Terrain, Elevation, and Obstacles.
imbue: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, Speed is 4 and Movement is Sprint.

name: Collapse
desc: A powerful technique that creates a cave below the ground, then collapses the ground downwards, sending enemies into a painful fall.
effect: All spaces in the area become _Rough_ and a _Hazard_. At the end of the Round, resolve the below Attack in the same Area and decrease the Area's Elevation by 3.
boost: 2 _Momentum_. Area becomes a Blast 3.
imbue: 1 _Grit_: Increase the Speed of this Technique by 1. You may use this Imbue multiple times but must increase its Cost by 1 each time.

name: Earth Kinesis
desc: The Earthbonded moves the earth of the battlefield around, choosing the shape as easily as breathing.
effect: Gain 1 _Grit_. Move the Target up to 5 spaces in any direction. If you move it into an occupied space, end the Movement but inflict _Push_ 1, _Impaired_ 1 (2 _Grit_/_Reflex_) and deal 2 _Crush_ Damage.
boost:
1 _Grit_: Add _Groundsource_. You may create an _Earth Pillar_ in an unoccupied space before resolving the Effect.
2 _Momentum_: Target is: A Size 2 Earthen Obstacle or three Size 1 Earthen Obstacles. If you move a Size 2 Earthen Obstacle instead inflict _Push_ 3, _Impaired_ 2 (3 _Grit_/_Reflex_).

name: Earth Rise
desc: The earthbound creates a pillar of earth, potentially launching a creature skyward.
effect: Create an _Earth Pillar_ in a space within range. If the space is occupied by a Size 1 creature, you may _Leaping_ _Slide_ 3 the creature unless they pay 2 _Reflex_ to Negate and immediately move 1 space. If the creature cannot Move, they cannot take this Reaction. The creature gains _Impaired_ 1 and takes 3 Crush Damage if they suffer this effect.
boost: 1 _Reflex_: Instead, create the _Earth Pillar_ in your space. Do not resolve the Effect, but when you create the _Earth Pillar_ you may immediately _Jump_ at no cost and separate from your Movement. Increase your Jump value by 2 while doing this.

name: Earth Shaping
desc: The Earthbonded molds the ground around them, creating obstacles or a path forward with ease.
effect:
Gain 1 _Grit_. Choose one of the following:
* Make three contiguous spaces within Range _Rough_ or _Jagged_.
* Remove _Rough_ or _Jagged_ from three contiguous spaces within range.
* Create _Stairs_ in a space within Range and gain 1 additional _Grit_.
 Create two _Earth Pillars_ in contiguous, adjacent spaces.
boost: 3 _Grit_: Instead of one of the above effects, create two Earth Columns in adjacent spaces.

name: Earth Slide
desc: The Earthbonded slides the ground beneath their feet forward, potentially leaving a wake of destruction behind.
effect: Create an Earth Platform in your space. You may then move it as well as your self 6 spaces. This does not count as forced movement.
boost:
2 _Momentum_: Make all spaces you move through _Rough_.
1 _Momementum_, paid when you move through a creature: Inflict _Impaired_ or _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Reflex_).

name: Earth Tomb
desc: By using nearby earth and stone the Earthbonded seals their foe away.
target: A Size 1 creature adjacent to at least two _Earthen Feature_s.
effect: Attack the target with the below Profile, destroying the _Earthen_ Obstacles. On a _Hit_/_Crit_,  _Entomb_ the creature in an _Earth Pillar_. A creature may end this _Entomb_ by _Sacrificing_ an Action and spending 4 _Grit_ or by destroying the _Earth Pillar_. If a creature spends _Reflex_ to Negate, they must immediately Move 1 and fall _Prone_. An _Earth Pillar_ is then created in their original space. If they cannot Move, they may not spend _Reflex_ in this way.
special: If there are 4 adjacent _Earthen_ Obstacles: Either this Attack is _Accurate_, or you may target a Size 2 creature and _Entomb_ them in an _Earth Column_. Destroy all _Earthen_ Obstacles used for this Attack.
boost: 2 _Grit_, 1 _Momentum_: Add _Groundsource_. You may resolve the normal Effect without any _Earthen_ Obstacles.

name: Earthen Shield
desc: The Earthbonded throws up a barricade, only using it when the right moment strikes.
trigger: You or a creature within range is Attacked.
effect: Grant the triggering creature _Cover_ and 1 _Guard_ against the triggering Attack. Then _Slide_ the Triggering creature 1 space and put an _Earth Pillar_ in their space.

name: Jagged Earth
desc: Blades of the earth appear out of nowhere, suddenly striking a foe.
effect: Attack with the below Profile. Immediately after resolving the attack make a space adjacent to the target _Jagged_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: This attack becomes _Accurate_ and you may instead make a Cone 1 _Jagged_, although at least one space must be adjacent to the Target.

name: Quake
desc: A minor earthquake, firing earth upward and testing the footing of all involved.
effect: Attack all targets in the area with the below Profile.
boost:
2 _Momentum_ Area becomes Burst 2.
2 _Grit_: You may make the Area _Rough_.

name: Quicksand
desc: Liquified earth threatens to swallow the unaware whole.
effect: The target Area becomes _Rough_. If more than half of a creature ever occupies spaces with Quicksand, they sink into the Quicksand and are _Restrained_ until they spend 2 _Grit_/_Reflex_ and their Movement on their Turn to escape. An adjacent creature can also Sacrifice an Action to free a creature from _Restrained_ without any Cost. A single space of Quicksand may only have one creature _Restrained_ at a time.
special: A character may only have three instances of Quickand at a time, regardless of their size.
boost:
2 _Momentum_. You instead create the Quicksand in a Blast 1 area.
2 _Grit_, 2 _Momementum_: You may Target an occupied Area with this Technique.

name: Spikes
desc: Hardened spikes rise up from the earth, leaving a jagged wake that is difficult to traverse.
effect: The area immediately becomes _Rough_ and _Jagged_. Any character in the area must spend 1 _Reflex_/_Momentum_ or gain _Hobbled_ 1.
boost: 1 _Momentum_. Place another Line 4 or Cone 2 connected to the initial Area.

name: Adaptive Strike
desc: You go in for a quick series of unarmed strikes against a foe.
effect: Attack using your weapon's _Profile_. After resolving the Attack, use the Form Change Maneuver.

name: Flawless Technique
desc: You easily make an unarmed strike without sacrificing your momentum in battle.
effect: Attack using your weapon's _Profile_.

name: Flurry of Blows
desc: You go in for a quick series of unarmed strikes against a foe.
effect: Make two Attacks against the same Target using any valid Weapons, at least one of which must be _Light_.

name: Pressure Point
desc: You make a precise, focused strike that interrupts a creature's bond with their spirit.
effect: Attack using your weapon's _Profile_. Inflict _Suppressed_ 1 (2 _Focus_) on a _Hit_/_Suppressed_ 2 (3 _Focus_) on a _Crit_.

name: Reaper
desc: You are a mass of fists and kicks, whirling across the battlefield in a frenzy.
effect: Make three Attacks using Unarmed Weapons.
special: Anytime you Defeat an enemy you gain another Reposition Move. All Movement from this Technique is _Safe_ against any creature you Attack.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Make 1 more Attack with an Unarmed Weapon. You may repeat this Boost, increasing the Cost by 1 each time.

name: Recovering Strike
desc: You make use of an unarmed strike to recompose yourself and remove debilitating conditions.
effect: Immediately before your Turn, gain any 2 _Defensive Tokens_. You may immediately spend these as if it was the end of your _Turn_ to clear any kind of _Condition_. Any remaining _Defensive Token_s gained from this ability that are not spent are lost. Attack using your weapon's _Profile_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, gain 3 _Defensive Tokens_.

name: Redirect
desc: You quickly strike an attacking foe, redirecting their blow.
trigger: You are attacked by an adjacent foe while you have an _Open Hand_.
